name: Getting To The Other Side!!!
description:
Many have heard the joke about the chicken getting to the other side of the street. Wouldn't you like to find out exactly how the chicken mentioned actually accomplished this goal? Find out in this modern spin on familiar arcade games of the past. Run and jump through six large levels that will test your reflexes and your patience. Many who have played this game have failed to reach the end due to frustration with it's clever level design, Will your playthrough be different? Find out if you dare!

Features:
- Carefully navigate through 6 large levels that are tough as nails!
- Colourful and stylized graphics everywhere you look
- Tight controls and clear user interface
- Funny and unique soundtrack and sound effects
